commentary: A journey into the thinking of the Sufis, such as the great Bulleh Shah.
This may be interpreted in at least two different ways:
1. The ravings of a supposed 'madman' to a spiritual aspirant; revealed to be fundamental truth.
2. An inner dialogue between the ego [the spiritual aspirant] and the higher Self [the 'madman'].
lyrics: ve bole bheti da tainu khabar naiyo sajna
You speak much, but you have no knowledge of one thing, my friend:
jehda nit tere vich bolda eh
The one who speaks through you everyday.
dhoonde bahar ja ke labbe ghar akay
You look for it outside, but it sits within your home.
wang murli kooda hai pharolda
Like a scavenger, you sift through garbage!
o bulleh shah jo tere ton vakh na hovay
O Bulleh Shah: That one who cannot be separated from you.
apay vaaj maaray apay bolda eh
When you call for it, it responds by itself.
haaji lok makkeh nu janday
The pilgrims go to Mecca:
mera ranjha mahi paka ni mein kamli aan
But my Beloved is unyielding! Oh, I am insane!
ni main kamli aan ni main kamli aan
Oh, I am insane! Oh, I am insane!
karleh dil di safayi je deedar chahida
Clean your inner self, if you wish to catch a glimpse of the Beloved!
tu jahan ton ki laina tainu yaar chahida
What do you need of the world? You need only the Beloved!
chaar chaphere kahnu takkaran maarda eh
Why do you make futile attempts in every direction?
jittiyan hoyan baaziyan kanu haarda eh
Why do you try to lose gambles that you have already won?
vekh le sohna har har de vich vasda
Look carefully: The Beautiful One permeates each and everything!
teriyan oh kartootan dekh ke hasda
Seeing your strange habits, it laughs!
ghare gawachi cheez tandoda shehar vich
You have lost this thing in your home, yet you go to search in the city.
fark nahi disda tenu apne ger vich
Do you not see the difference between one's own and the other?
kehn siyane dil hai khaana rab da
The wise ones say: The inner self is the hiding place of God.
je labay ta yaar khazana lab da
If it is found, then my friend, a treasure is found!
gaur te karke vekh akal dey aneya
Reflect upon this, oh you of insufficient intellect:
kudrat vehki fer vi rab na maneya
You have seen nature, yet you have not recognized God?
je rab milta nateya dhoteya
If God is to be found by bathing and cleaning:
tan milda dadoan machhiyan
Then God is found by frogs and fish!
je rab milda jungle vele
If God is to be found by defecating:
tan milda gaooa majjiyan
Then God is found by cows and buffalos!
je rab mil da vich masiti
If God is found within the Mosque:
tan milda chamcharikiya
Then he is found by bats!
bulleya rab ohna nu milda
Bulleh Shah says: God is found by those:
bhai neeta jinha diyan sachian
Who have true intentions!
ni main kamli aan ni main kamli aan
Oh, I am insane! Oh, I am insane!
ohde hath vich koi talwar vi nahi
It carries no sword in it's hand:
ohda khaali janda vaar vi nahi
Yet, none of it's strikes miss!
padh-padh ilm hazar kitaban
Reading and reading, thousands of prayers and books:
kadi apne aap nu padeya nahi
Yet, you have not read yourself!
ja ja vad-de mandir masiti
Going and going, to the Mandir and the Mosque:
kade mann apne vich vadeya nahi
Yet, you have not gone inside your mind!
awin lad-da e shaitan de naal bandeya
Oh Man! Futily you fight against Satan:
kade nafs apne naal ladeya nahi
Yet, you have not fought with your own ego!
akhe peer bulleh shah
Says Bulleh Shah, the Sufi elder:
asmani udh deya fad da eh
You attempt to capture that which flies in the sky.
jeda mann vich vasda ohnu phadeya nahi
Yet, you have not even caught the one who lives in your own mind!
ni main kamli aan ni main kamli aan
Oh, I am insane! Oh, I am insane!
sach akheyan bhambad machda eh
Speaking the truth causes turmoil to erupt!
jooth bholeya kuch na bachda eh
Yet, speaking lies leaves nothing of value left.
ni main kamli aan ni main kamli aan
Oh, I am insane! Oh, I am insane!
ho main tan mandiran chad-di hoyi aan
Oh, I have left the temples:
mera babul kalla ae kalla [?]
My Father is One and only.
maadi matli teri pasand meinu
This sickness of Yours! Is enjoyable to me!
ni main kamli aan ni main kamli aan
Oh, I am insane! Oh, I am insane!
